body:
Im back to finish my goal in Neb.... Which is to kill Azurekitty 4 more times, because i still need her lives. Im leaving Kitty with 1 life left. After i finish my goal i'm only going to be on in the holidays, but still playing less.

Sorry for the inconveniences
